divs: Sighting Detailswhile riding around the plant that i work at in a golf cart i happened to notice a vey large and bright star looking oject coming from the west.when the oject got overhead of me it turned to the southeast.i first thought it might be a sattelite but i know sattelites keep the same flight path and dont make turns.i watched the object until it dissapeared on the southeastern horizon.what amazed me was the brightness and the star like appearance.
